overview: A Collector's DVD on the "Adrenalamaniacs" who tear up the faces of what has been called the most powerful, life-threatening wave on the planet. Come face to face with these titanic waves as well as this elite breed of watermen as they take you behind the scenes, on a journey of a lifetime. Find out why they would risk their lives to ride this beast and "to go where no man has gone before..."
title: Liquid Thunder
